greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of -Zeta'(-1)/2.
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge University Press, 2003, Section 2.15 Glaisher-Kinkelin constant, p. 135.
formula: Equals 1/24 - log(A)/2, where A is the Glaisher-Kinkelin constant 1.282427... (A074962).
results.author: _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 02 2015
